subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The German cyclist Matthias Kessler remains hospitalized in critical condition in Palma de Majorca, Balearic Islands, after sustaining head injuries in a crash last week.
snippet: The German cyclist Matthias Kessler remains hospitalized in critical condition in Palma de Majorca, Balearic Islands, after sustaining head injuries in a crash last week.
